metadata.Title: CVE-2020-11722 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup (aka DCSS or crawl) before 0.25 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via Lua bytecode embedded in an uploaded .crawlrc file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-11722` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

crawl - 2:0.25.0-1
crawl-common - 2:0.25.0-1
crawl-tiles - 2:0.25.0-1
crawl-tiles-data - 2:0.25.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: crawl package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:0.25.0-1').
